Class.ClassComment: Role /** * Specifies the name and scope role for a seam component role. If a component has no <tt>@Role</tt> annotation, it has exactly one role, defined by <tt>@Name</tt> and <tt>@Scope</tt>. If it has one or more <tt>@Role</tt> annotations, the component has one or more roles in addition to the default role defined by <tt>@Name</tt> and <tt>@Scope</tt>. * @author CÃ©sar Izurieta */
